data.title: St. Brendan the Navigator
data.meta_description: St. Brendan the Navigator - Columbarium page
data.text:
St. Brendan Columbarium and Memorial Garden

St. Brendan is dedicated to the respectful care of our Parish family who even in death remain a part of our community and spiritual heritage. Our Columbarium is recognition of the deep religious significance of the Corporal and Spiritual Works of Mercy involved in burial of the dead and reverence for the deceased through continuous prayer.

This Catholic cemetery or columbarium is an extension of our church. In this shared place of common Catholic beliefs those who worshipped and prayed with us in life now await together the resurrection of the body in death.

Choosing our Columbarium as a final resting place for your loved ones offers:

Serenity - Provides a peaceful place for visitors, loved ones, friends, and future generations. Seating and prayer gardens offer tranquil respites for the mourning.

Estate Planning - Addresses a critical step in end of life planning for your family. This resting place comforts loved ones and connects future generations.

Perpetual Care - A portion of your fee is committed to the guaranteed maintenance of the grounds.

Hope in the Resurrection - The Memorial Garden offers hope and faith in Jesus' resurrection as portrayed by sculptures in the garden.

Pricing and Payments

Our Columbarium can accommodate single or double need. The price includes urns, engraved faceplate, perpetual care and all other associated costs. Minimum deposits are required and all funds must be paid within one year of deposit or before a loved one is inurned. Payment plans are available.

For current pricing email columbarium@StBrendansATL.com.

To make a payment on a niche, please click HERE.
